sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' function TaskItem(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const [value, setValue] = useState({title: props.task.title, comment: props.task.body}); const onValue = ({target:{value}}) => setValue(value); const onFormSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(value.title) setValue() } return (
{props.task.title} {props.task.state}

{props.task.body}
) } export default TaskItem
